name: getcountrybyip
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool countrybyip.
Tool description: Get country code by providing IP address (IPV4 & IPV6). We aim to provide output at lightning speed.
API description: Retrieves the country information for a given IP address using the Country by IP API. Both IPv4 and IPv6 are supported.

ip.description: The IP address for which to retrieve the country information.
